Rust.name: Rust
Rust.description: I am personally interested in Rust, as it is both easy to learn and powerful. I have reimplemented my QuickChat program in Rust with all its features, currently looking into implementing its GUI in Rust as well.

Unreal Engine.name: Unreal Engine by Epic Games
Unreal Engine.description: Fan of the Unreal Engine, looking forward to learning more about it in the near future.

TensorFlow.name: TensorFlow by Google
TensorFlow.description: Have used TensorFlow for a few of my older projects, and am still learning new things about it. I have created an LSTM model for word prediction. Curious about various text tokenization methods, and how to implement them in TensorFlow.

AOSP.name: Android Open Source Project by Google
AOSP.description: Built a couple ROMs for my old phones, always been a fan of Android. Android is what made me want to learn programming in the first place. Even though I don't build ROMs anymore, I still keep up with the latest Android changes under the hood.

Video Games.name: Video Games
Video Games.description: I have been playing video games since I brought my first PC. I like to play games that are fun, and have a good story. I have played games like Grand Theft Auto V, Red Dead Redemption 2, God of War, Minecraft, etc. Video games are a great way to relax and have fun.
